# Marketing Websites Monorepo
> Enterprise-grade multi-tenant SaaS platform for marketing websites with 2026 documentation standards

## Docs
- [Getting Started](docs/tutorials/): Setup and learning paths for new developers
- [How-To Guides](docs/how-to/): Task-oriented guides for feature development and deployment
- [API Reference](docs/reference/): Complete API documentation and configuration reference
- [Architecture Decisions](docs/explanation/): System design and technical philosophy

## Key Features
- Multi-tenant SaaS architecture with secure tenant isolation
- Next.js 16 with React 19 Server Components and App Router
- Feature-Sliced Design (FSD) v2.1 for scalable code organization
- OAuth 2.1 with PKCE authentication and zero-trust security
- Stripe payment processing and Cal.com scheduling integration
- WCAG 2.2 AA accessibility compliance and Core Web Vitals optimization

## Technology Stack
- Frontend: Next.js 16, React 19, TypeScript 5.9, Tailwind CSS
- Backend: Supabase (PostgreSQL), Node.js, tRPC
- Infrastructure: Vercel, Turborepo, pnpm workspaces
- Testing: Playwright, Vitest, React Testing Library
- Monitoring: Sentry, Core Web Vitals, custom analytics

## Development Workflow
1. Environment setup with pnpm and Turborepo
2. Feature development using FSD layer isolation
3. Testing with automated CI/CD pipeline
4. Deployment with zero-downtime releases
5. Monitoring and observability

## Business Model
- Multi-tenant SaaS for marketing websites
- Agency client management with automated provisioning
- Usage-based billing with Stripe integration
- 1000+ client site scalability

## Compliance & Security
- GDPR/CCPA compliant data handling
- SOC 2 Type II security controls
- OWASP Top 10 vulnerability prevention
- Multi-tenant data isolation with RLS policies

## Performance Standards
- Core Web Vitals: LCP <2.5s, INP <200ms, CLS <0.1
- Bundle size: JS <250KB gzipped
- Uptime: 99.9% availability SLA
- Page load: <3s global average

## AI Integration
- MCP servers for context streaming and agent orchestration
- RAG pipeline for documentation and code assistance
- Automated testing and deployment workflows
- Predictive analytics for performance optimization
